# ThreatScope™ Mobile XTM

In this section of the Appdome Knowledge Base, learn how to enable and use Appdome's ThreatScope™ mobile XTM to monitor and respond to cyber, malware and fraud attacks against Android & iOS mobile apps in real time. ThreatScope can be used as a stand-alone security operations center (SOC) for the mobile business. Alternatively, the data from ThreatScope can be used to enrich your existing SIEM environment. In either case, you'll get real time attack data and telemetry from in-production consumer and enterprise applications. All with no code, no SDK and no implementation needed. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact support@appdome.com.
